room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
review: My friends and I did the Bank Heist room and had a great time! Our staff, “Little Will,” was super nice and helpful. I would definitely recommend this event to my friends!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
review: My friend and I went to the Escape Room Zone in Farmington tonight and tried the Bank Heist! We ultimately lost but we had a great time and our game master Allison was super nice, helpful and made our time there a lot of fun! Definitely going back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
review: This was our second time doing escape room and we loved it! We had Kaitlyn and she was awesome! We did the Bank Heist this time and I completely recommend this room! So much fun to be had here!
